effect_entries.effect: Teaches Avalanche to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Volt Switch to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Avalanche)

flavor_text_entries.text:
攻撃したあと
ものすごい　スピードで　もどってきて
控えポケモンと　入れ替わる。

After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with
a party Pokémon in waiting.

Chi usa questa mossa si tira indietro
per farsi sostituire dopo aver sferrato l’attacco.

Después de atacar, quien lo usa cambia
rápidamente su puesto con un compañero
que no esté combatiendo.

Nach der Attacke eilt der Anwender zurück und
tauscht den Platz mit einem anderen Pokémon.

Après son attaque, le lanceur revient à toute
vitesse et change de place avec un Pokémon
de l’équipe prêt au combat.

공격한 뒤
굉장한 스피드로 돌아와서
교대 포켓몬과 교체한다.

こうげき　したあと
ものすごい　スピードで　もどってきて
ひかえ　ポケモンと　いれかわる。

After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with
a party Pokémon in waiting.

After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with
a party Pokémon in waiting.

Après son attaque, le lanceur revient à
toute vitesse et change de place avec
un Pokémon de l’équipe prêt au combat.

An attack move that inflicts double
the damage if the user has been hurt
by the foe in the same turn.

the damage if the user has been hurt
by the foe in the same turn.

the damage if the user has been hurt
by the foe in the same turn.
